title: Site-Specific RNA Modification via Initiation of In vitro Transcription Reactions with m6A and Isomorphic Emissive Adenosine Analogs

The templated enzymatic incorporation of adenosine and its analogs, including m6A, thA and tzA into RNA transcripts, has been explored. Enforced transcription initiation with excess free nucleosides and the native...
